name: DAIRY FARMERS OF AMERICA INC
sampleDescriptions: We are urging Congress and the Administration to create an agricultural visa program for use by dairy farmers.
North American Free Trade Agreement - Contacted Congress about Canada dairy policy.

S. 130 and H.R. 778 DAIRY PRIDE ACT (Defending Against Imitations and Replacements of Yogurt, milk and cheese to Promote Regular Intake of Dairy Everyday Act).  We support its passage and have been ad
We are urging Congress to make changes to the Margin Protection Program in the next Farm Bill.
H.R. 1 - Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.  We urged Congress to make changes to the tax code that would benefit dairy producers.
